Learn more about XAI

Explainable Artificial Intelligence has never been a straightforward part of a Data Science ecosystem. Therefore, this part is provided for every user which may not feel totally sound at every part of a main dashboard. Plots seem pretty, they do, but it's more important to be able to read, analyze them, and reach for every insightful detail they contain. Ensuing chapters ought to hand over the essence of every method used, both for local and global explanations.
